Summary: small shiny orb flying in and out of clouds
divs: sighting detailsi go to a chick fil a for lunch and take it back to a open field by st. pete\clearwater airport to eat and watch planes take off and land. it was a typical summer day with puffy clouds. i saw a cloud that was kinda vertical. a small shiny orb like object flew out and back into the cloud. it popped out many times popping out a little higher than before. i took off my sun glasses and looked again, i rubbed my eyes and looked again, and i finally accepted that something was popping in and out of the clouds.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in St. Petersburg
There were no other sightings in St. Petersburg on or around June 16th 2009
